name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForCardiomyopathy
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Cardiomyopathy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to cardiomyopathy and is listed as a cardiovascular disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes hypertrophic, dilated, ischemic and restrictive cardiomyopathies.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes fetal and obstetric related cardiomyopathy.)
